definition: to replace the old with new/to renew/to renovate/to upgrade/to update/to regenerate
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
(in the spring) nature takes on a new look (idiom)
Pleistocene (geological epoch from 2m years ago, covering the most recent ice ages)
to replace the old with new (idiom)

sentences.chinese: 更新基於映像部署的客戶機。

sentences.english: The type of an access intent can be either read or update.
sentences.chinese: 訪問意圖的類型可以是讀取或是更新。

sentences.english: Second, update the landscape character on Kuling town .
sentences.chinese: 其次，更新牯嶺鎮景觀風貌。

sentences.english: Scroll down to read about the latest update, or just click here.
sentences.chinese: 滾動鼠標向下，閱讀最新的更新，或者點擊這裏。

sentences.english: Most have to be set to auto-update and protect you from further infection.
sentences.chinese: 最有可自動更新，保護你再感染。

sentences.english: For patch updates and to play a fast demo, see below.
sentences.chinese: 修補更新和發揮快速演示，見下文。

sentences.english: After about 6 months of silence, there have been some significant updates.
sentences.chinese: 在沉寂了6個月之後，這些內容終於有了重大的更新。

sentences.english: We update sensitivities matrix by the quasi-Newton method after the first inversion.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次反演之後，採用擬牛頓法更新靈敏度矩陣。

sentences.english: Its update interval could even be one day.
sentences.chinese: 它的更新間隔甚至縮短到了一天。

sentences.english: I love to watch everything come to life in spring.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看到春天萬象更新。

sentences.english: Even Fan’s Wikipedia page had already been updated with a line referring to the incident.
sentences.chinese: 甚至連方濱興的維基百科頁面也已經做出了相關更新。

sentences.english: We can update the system in the field.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在信號場內更新系統。

sentences.english: The adoption of this invention can simplify its technological process and renew the dockage-removing system.
sentences.chinese: 採用此項發明，工藝簡化，更新了除雜系統。

sentences.english: Need updated website design changes and functions on site.
sentences.chinese: 需要更新網站的設計變更和現場功能。

sentences.english: The field cache has therefore been modified such that it only reloads parts where the segment has changed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，修改後的字段緩存只會加載更新過的片斷。

definition: to escalate (in intensity)/to go up by one grade/to be promoted/to upgrade (computing)
to revise the current edition/revised edition
to put goods on shelves/(of a product) to be available for sale
to transition to a new dynasty or regime/to replace an older product with an upgraded, new-generation one
